Hi JUnit:ers!

The simplest way of checking that no tests in a suite depend=
 on network 
access is of course to simply pull the network cord and see wh=
ich tests 
fail. (Or disabling the network card if you don't want to leave =
your 
keyboard...)

But how do I make sure that no tests depend on anything=
 else outside 
the JVM? I am looking for a simple and full-proof way to dis=
allow file 
system access, registry access and the like. (No need for fancy=
 
programmatic approaches, manual steps are fine.) 

Any ideas? Thanks.

/M=
artin
